text: William Lacy Clay Jr. (born July 27, 1956) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative from from 2001 to 2021. He is a member of the Democratic Party. On August 4, 2020, he lost the Democratic primary to serve for an 11th term to community activist and progressive Democrat Cori Bush. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Missouri Category:Politicians from St. Louis, Missouri Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians Category:Members of the Missouri General Assembly
title: Lacy Clay
